name: Recycle Team
description:
A casual but challenging recycling game! Clean up this town!

Recycle Team is a top-down pixel art game in which you must run against time to collect all of the garbage in the town and throw it away. But it won't be easy, since rude citizens are littering the whole place. Are you up to the challenge?

Developed by Felipe Pêpe for the "My First Game Jam: Winter 2022" game jam. You can check out my other projects at my page!
